description: Relocation Services in support of Environment and Climate Change Canada’s (ECCC) Facilities Management,Montreal Region.",
full_summary:
Tender Title

English Title: Moving Services for Montreal Region

French Title: Service de déménagement pour la région de Montréal

Tender ID: PW-22-01006621 / Solicitation ID: 5000066688 / Amendment ID: 1

Publication Date: 8 September 2022 / Tender Close Date and Time: 7 October 2022, 14:00:00

Amendment Date: 9 September 2022 / Expected Contract Start Date: Not Available / Expected Contract End Date: Not Available

Tender Details

Procurement Description: Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) invites proposals for relocation services as part of its facilities management in the Montreal region.

Scope of Work

The Contractor shall be required to provide relocation services for crew supervisors, installers, and movers to perform relocation services within and between multiple buildings located in Montreal. The Contractor shall provide all necessary resources, transportation, instruments, tools, equipment, materials, and lifting equipment to perform tasks safely and efficiently without additional costs.

Locations of Work

The relocation services shall be performed at various locations within the Montreal region.

Contact Information

Contact Name: Samri, Moufid, Email: moufid.samri@ec.gc.ca, Phone: 514-496-2617, Fax: None
